presentation.title: Hi, I'm Ricardo, nice to meet you.
presentation.description:
I'm being a web developer for 2 years ago, I've worked for a big company as a trainy, I've worked as a volunteer developer for my college and currently, I work for a health company as a front-end developer; 
 I love learning new things and i try to share my knowledge at dev.to.

aboutMe.title: Aboud my self
aboutMe.contet: Hi there!, I'm Ricardo Perez, I'm <1>{{age}}</1> years old and currently I live at Mexico City.
aboutMe.hobbies: I'm a huge fan of video games and science fiction, I try to organize me to have time to play video games at least twice a week, spend enough time with my family, my friends, have time for my self as well as my work and keep improving my developer skills.

background.title: My background
background.contet: For the last two years I've been a web developer in a professional level, the first nine months I worked as a full stack developer, then I moved to a front end position, where I currently stay working; Before that, when I was at college, I participate as volunteer developing projects for my faculty alongside some of my classmates.

todo-app.title: Pomodor app
todo-app.description: Pomodoro app it's and application to manage tasks, made with Angular and Firebase

weather-app.title: Weather App
